description: Policy for when to create PRs vs direct commits in Claude Code

comments.files_changed: Number of modified/added/deleted files that triggers PR
comments.lines_changed: Total additions + deletions that triggers PR
comments.core_files: List of critical files that always require PR (supports globs)
comments.pr_required_if: Logic: 'any' (OR) or 'all' (AND) - any means PR if ANY threshold exceeded
